Controls

W A S D
Move around
MOUSE Look around (pointer lock)
CLICK Grab or release objects
ESC Open pause menu
LEFT STICK Move around
RIGHT SIDE Look around
TAP Interact with objects
MENU Open pause menu

Hand tracking is optional. Enable it from the onboarding screen.
